Will be returning this as the seams are not finished well on the shorts and can tell that it will not last.  The seams are bulky and also not sewed together well which makes it a weak point on the shorts. Due to the nature of exercise and the frequent washings, I want something that will last a while.  As far as color, I love it. Its perfect. The sizing is a little off. Large works for me and I could have sized up to XL to be a little bit more comfortable. I would recommend sizing up if your in between sizes.  But over all, 2 stars for the sewing quality.
